nodes.text: Vault of the Mother Machine was one of the Rakata vaults in the Cells of the Lords of the Infinite, a section of the Tomb on the planet Belsavis. The vault housed the Mother Machine, a device with which the Rakata sought to restore their Force-sensitivity.
Vault of the Mother Machine appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic during the Sith Inquisitor class mission on Belsavis.
